name: msgvault
description: Search and retrieve local msgvault email archives via HTTP API.

baseUrl.description: Base URL for msgvault API (default: http://127.0.0.1:8080).

apiKeyEnv.description: Environment variable that stores the msgvault API key.

defaultAccount.description: Default account email used when account is omitted.

apiKeyEnv.label: API Key Env Var
apiKeyEnv.help: Environment variable name that contains the msgvault API key.

allowSync.label: Allow Sync Tool
allowSync.help: When disabled, msgvault_sync_account returns a policy error.
